content: Actually, revisiting this PR after a few weeks, I may have done too many things at once
I'll split it off into smaller PRs
Yeah actually sorry, I'll just close this PR and make a bunch of smaller, less controversial ones.
When I have time, what I end up doing is going through my stale PRs and split them up. That seems to work quite well!
Violeta Hernández has marked this topic as resolved.
